title: LFW 2017: Kareena Kapoor Khan stuns as showstopper at the grand finale - Times of India
text: LFW 2017: Kareena Kapoor Khan stuns as showstopper at the grand finale Kareena Kapoor Khan is unstoppable and has managed to grab eyeballs. TNN | Updated: Feb 5, 2017, 11.07 PM IST Kareena Kapoor Khan is unstoppable and has managed to grab eyeballs. She always makes a mark be it in Bollywood parties or fashion shows. Taking her style quotient to a new level, the yummy mummy walked the ramp at the grand finale of the Lakme Fashion Week in Mumbai just 45 days after giving birth to baby boy Taimur Ali Khan Pataudi. The ‘Heroine’ of Bollywood turned showstopper for designer Anita Dogre and walked in a gold dress from her Alchemy collection. Dressed in a flowing white ensemble with a floor-length cape, the diva wooed the guests and paparazzi with her enigmatic presence. Just a few months ago, the heavily pregnant Bebo had rocked the fashion world by walking the ramp with her baby bump in a royal lehenga-kurti for Sabyasachi at the grand finale of the Lakme Fashion Week 2016 (winter/festive).
